fullText: Sean Hayes delivers a powerhouse performance as Oscar Levant in this intimate biographical play that captures the wit and melancholy of the brilliant but troubled pianist and comedian.
dtliExcerpt: Sean Hayes delivers a powerhouse performance as Oscar Levant in this intimate biographical play that captures the wit and melancholy of the brilliant but troubled pianist and comedian.
